name: Eel Snake - Pet Simulator
description:
Try to learn more about this strange underwater creature – eel! Swim across the real ocean depth, fight with dangerous predators, follow your instincts and desires – play Eel Snake - Pet Simulator game! Create a real family or just choose the fighter path – you can do everything you wish here!

Eel Snake - Pet Simulator features:
- Interesting deep sea pet simulation
- Awesome missions and quests
- Various skins and power-ups
- Family life profits and other things
- Nice way to feel like something else
- Thriving nature and serious rivals
- Fish as the main yummy food
- Realistic ocean surroundings made in 3D

Pass through dozens of quests starting with the young eel period, going through the stage of maturation and ending with a really wise species!
